attributes.action: make "Biking" (in the form of riding a motorcycle) a recognised religion
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Motorcycle community is fed up with constant persecution from everyone from car drivers to politicians. Our rights are being slowly erroded for the activities we undertake. As a recognised religion the motorcycle community will have full rights against such persecution.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
